Front brakes: Single disc. Dual piston caliper. Hard chromed cast iron disk
Rear brakes: Single disc. Dual piston caliper. Hard chromed cast iron disk
Color options: Chromed Fuel Tank with air-brushed metalic blue styling strips and Side Covers
Exhaust system: Twin downswept with balance pipe, Dual silencers.
Frame type: Twin Downtube Cradle. Oil in frame.
Comments: King/Queen seat with grey vinyl seat inserts.
Modifications compared to previous model: Differs from standard Bonneville in that the Fuel Tank is chromed and many extra alloy parts were polished. Custom paint airbrushed. The King/Queen seat set it apart from the standard Bonneville as well.
Seat height: 787 mm (31.0 inches) If adjustable, lowest setting.

Rear brakes: Single disc. Twin piston caliper, cast iron disk
Color options: Chrome Tank with black styling stripes. Black engine and mag wheels. Silver Frame.
Exhaust system: Twin downswept with balance pipe, Dual silencers.
Frame type: Twin Downtube Cradle. Oil in frame.
Comments:
250 produced with certificates
of authenticity in celebration of the
marriage of Prince Charles and
Lady Dianna Spencer
Modifications compared to previous model: Differed from the US variant of the Royal Wedding Limited Edition considerably. US variant had black frame and everything else was highly chromed or polished. Euro variant had silver frame, chrome tank and the emphasis of everything else was black.
Seat height: 787 mm (31.0 inches) If adjustable, lowest setting.
